# The pcm files were generated from the wav files using the command:
# ffmpeg -i file.wav -f s8 -ac 1 -ar 12207 file.pcm
#
# Then the .au files were generated by the command (from the audio folder):
# python ../misc/mkaudio.py -i ../misc/audio.txt -o ../assets/bank
# The data block between {} at the end is then pasted in data.c as audioData

# file name         loops           Priority

coindrop.pcm                    # AUDIO_COINDROP
game_start.pcm                  # AUDIO_GAME_START
highscore.pcm         1         # AUDIO_HIGHSCORE
next_level.pcm                  # AUDIO_NEXT_LEVEL
player_shoot.pcm                # AUDIO_PLAYER_SHOOT
rocket_fly.pcm        1         # AUDIO_ROCKET_FLY
bossl0.pcm            1         # AUDIO_BOSSL0
bossl1.pcm            1         # AUDIO_BOSSL1
bossl2.pcm            1         # AUDIO_BOSSL2
bossl3.pcm            1         # AUDIO_BOSSL3
wapon_explode.pcm               # AUDIO_WAPON_EXPLODE
enemy_explode.pcm               # AUDIO_ENEMY_EXPLODE
enemy_shoot.pcm                 # AUDIO_ENEMY_SHOOT
bomb.pcm                        # AUDIO_BOMB
rocket_launch.pcm               # AUDIO_ROCKET_LAUNCH
pickup.pcm                      # AUDIO_PICKUP
extra_life.pcm                  # AUDIO_EXTRA_LIFE
wave_start.pcm                  # AUDIO_WAVE_START
big_explosion.pcm               # AUDIO_BIG_EXPLOSION
timewarp.pcm                    # AUDIO_TIMEWARP
